function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE

","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of large scale quasi-experimental studies on the effectiveness of ubpi in the clinical setting","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of support for digital transformation processes","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid increase in
